essilan was a merchant who conducted his business in Beregost during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Tessilan worked with two other merchants, Glayde and Faltis.
In the , Tessilan and his fellow businessmen were targeted by the scam artist Silke Rosena. She arranged to make a purchase of gems from them at the Red Sheaf inn, while telling others a different story. Silke told Garrick and some others that Tessilan, Glayde, and Faltis were thugs coming to collect payment for a missed performance at Feldeposts Inn. She hoped to have Tessilans group mugged in order to steal the gems and get away all the richer.
